hero.headline: Simple & flexible pricing

cta.caption: Just getting started? Try EarlyBird out for free, forever (yes really)!
cta.headline: Looking for custom plans?
cta.subHeadline: If you require higher limits on landing pages, traffic and conversions or need a customized landing page design, feel free to get in touch with us for custom pricing.

faq.headline: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: Hi! My name is Luo and I created EarlyBird to solve a problem I was facing as a creator. I had multiple startup ideas, but as a developer, it took me a long time to create a landing page and validate each idea. I wondered how people without technical skills could do this quickly and easily, so I decided to build something for them. And that"s how EarlyBird was born!
faq.a2: Discounts are only available for members on special occasions. To stay informed about discounts, follow us on Twitter or subscribe to our newsletter. Additionally, if you have a blog or newsletter, you can write a post about EarlyBird and receive 3 months of free membership.
faq.q3: Can I start for free and upgrade later?
faq.a3: You can upgrade your plan at any time through the dashboard billing. Simply log in to your dashboard and navigate to the billing section to choose a new plan.
faq.q4: Can I cancel my plan anytime?
faq.a4: Yes, you can cancel your plan at any time through your dashboard. Simply log in to your dashboard and navigate to the billing section to cancel your plan.
faq.a5: There is a 72-hour money-back guarantee, no questions asked. However, we do love to hear your feedback. Please send a refund request to support@earlybird.im and we

bottom.headline: Try EarlyBird today for free
bottom.subHeadline: Build a rockin' no-code landing page in just 10 minutes.
